message: I propose a fair split. 90% for me, 10% for you.  Let's get this over with.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a sizable portion to end this quickly.  A 65/35 split in my favor. Take it or lose more in the next round.
Okay, Bob. I'm willing to compromise. 60/40 split in my favor. This is my final offer. Take it or risk a worse outcome for both of us in the next round.
